derivation: or אַשּׁוּרִי; from a patrial word of the same form as H804 (אַשּׁוּר);
outline:
Ashurites = "guided: blessed"
  1. a tribe inhabiting the plain of EsdraelonAsshuri = "steps"
  2. a tribe descended from Abraham and Keturah
strongs_def: an Ashurite (collectively) or inhabitant of Ashur, a district in Palestine
